channel.title: Clowns sans Frontières
channel.description: Ce que les médecins font pour le corps, les clowns le font pour l'âme

item.title: [:en]Icon[:fr]Icone[:]
item.dc:creator: cephalo
item.content:encoded:
a:15:{s:4:"type";s:5:"image";s:12:"instructions";s:464:"[:en]Choose the image that will be displayed in order to click on the partner.
It is recommended to choose an image in png format with transparency bearing your website's colors.

The square aspect is not mandatory.[:fr]Choisir l'image qui s'affichera afin de cliquer sur le partenaire.
Il est recommandé de choisir une image au format png avec transparence portant les couleurs de votre site.

L'aspect carré n'est pas obligatoire.[:]";s:8:"required";i:0;s:17:"conditional_logic";a:1:{i:0;a:1:{i:0;a:3:{s:5:"field";s:19:"field_617c694f91260";s:8:"operator";s:2:"==";s:5:"value";s:6:"raster";}}}s:7:"wrapper";a:3:{s:5:"width";s:0:"";s:5:"class";s:0:"";s:2:"id";s:0:"";}s:13:"return_format";s:3:"url";s:12:"preview_size";s:6:"medium";s:7:"library";s:3:"all";s:9:"min_width";s:0:"";s:10:"min_height";s:0:"";s:8:"min_size";s:0:"";s:9:"max_width";s:0:"";s:10:"max_height";s:0:"";s:8:"max_size";s:0:"";s:10:"mime_types";s:0:"";}

item.title: [:en]Link[:fr]Lien[:]
item.dc:creator: cephalo
item.content:encoded: a:6:{s:4:"type";s:4:"link";s:12:"instructions";s:112:"[:en]Link to the partner's website, if possible.[:fr]Lien vers le site du partenaire en question, si possible[:]";s:8:"required";i:0;s:17:"conditional_logic";i:0;s:7:"wrapper";a:3:{s:5:"width";s:0:"";s:5:"class";s:0:"";s:2:"id";s:0:"";}s:13:"return_format";s:3:"url";}

item.title: [:en]Icon[:fr]Icone[:]
item.dc:creator: cephalo
item.content:encoded:
a:6:{s:4:"type";s:4:"link";s:12:"instructions";s:599:"[:en]Choose the image that will be displayed in order to click on the partner.
It is recommended to choose an image with transparency bearing your website's colors.

Wordpress refuses to support the svg format, but as long as we have its url, it is possible to load any image.[:fr]Choisir l'image qui s'affichera afin de cliquer sur le partenaire.
Il est recommandé de choisir une image avec transparence portant les couleurs du site.

Wordpress refuse de prendre en charge le format svg, mais tant qu'on a son url, il est possible de charger n'importe quelle image.[:]";s:8:"required";i:0;s:17:"conditional_logic";a:1:{i:0;a:1:{i:0;a:3:{s:5:"field";s:19:"field_617c694f91260";s:8:"operator";s:2:"==";s:5:"value";s:6:"vector";}}}s:7:"wrapper";a:3:{s:5:"width";s:0:"";s:5:"class";s:0:"";s:2:"id";s:0:"";}s:13:"return_format";s:3:"url";}
